entries.content:
Starting WelcomeScreen.js ultra-modular refactoring. File is 750 lines with mixed responsibilities:
- SVG template generation (500+ lines of gradient definitions)
- 4 different animation systems (flash, fade-out, radius morphing, gradient rotation)
- DOM management
- Lifecycle coordination
- Event handling

Following proven orchestrator pattern from 17+ previous refactorings.

WelcomeScreen ultra-modular refactoring complete! 

Transformed 750-line monolith into 7 focused components:
- WelcomeScreen.js (Orchestrator - ~120 lines)
- WelcomeScreenDOM.js (DOM management - ~130 lines)
- WelcomeLogoSVG.js (SVG template - ~200 lines)
- FlashAnimationController.js (~115 lines)
- FadeOutAnimationController.js (~118 lines)
- RadiusMorphController.js (~104 lines)
- GradientRotationController.js (~125 lines)

Total: ~912 lines across 7 files (was 750 in 1 file)
Average per component: 130 lines
Pattern: Orchestrator with dependency injection
Zero breaking changes - same public API

Added GridShineSweepController to welcome screen!

New Feature: Automatic metallic shine sweep that periodically sweeps across entire logo grid
- Creates overlay element with gradient
- Triggers sweep every 6 seconds (configurable)
- 0.8s sweep duration
- Gradient: rgba(255,255,255,0.3) for metallic effect
- Follows ultra-modular pattern (8th animation controller)
- Integrated into WelcomeScreen orchestrator
- Build passes âœ…

Ready to test in browser and tweak timing/colors/intensity!
